id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique internal identifier for the social investment deal.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the deal. Ideally, this is concise and under 140 characters.

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the social investment deal: in progress, an open investment, closed without funds being drawn down, closed without core funds being approved.
enum_descriptions: The deal is anticipated or under development.
Investments can be made into this deal.
No new investments can be made, but the project funded by the deal may be ongoing.

dealDate.title: Deal date
dealDate.description: The year (YYYY) or year-month (YYYY-MM) combination in which this deal should be counted. For a blended finance deal this should be the date of [financial close](http://www.businessdictionary.com/definition/financial-close.html). For other deals, this should be the date at which the most significant component was confirmed. Data analysts should be aware that components of a deal may each have their own significant dates.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The default currency for the deal. All values within the deal are assumed to be in this currency unless otherwise stated. Use GBP for £

estimatedValue.title: Estimated deal value
estimatedValue.description: The total estimated value of this deal. This should be based on the **optimum** fund raising targets where these are available. In cases where a range if presented, the mid-point should be used. The estimated deal value may be based on documents, and does not necessarily match the sum of the values of the investments components of this deal recorded in this dataset.

value.title: Confirmed deal value
value.description: The total value of this deal based on confirmed funds raised.

recipientOrganization.title: Recipient Organization
recipientOrganization.description: The Organization in receipt of the finances from the social investment deal.

arrangingOrganization.title: Arranging Organization
arrangingOrganization.description: The lead Organization arranging the social investment deal.

offers.title: Offers
offers.description: An offer describes the opportunity for investors to join a particular deal by providing finance by purchasing shares, making loans or providing some other form of input described by the offer documents. Each deal may have one or more offers associated with it.

investments.title: Investments
investments.description: The financial components of the deal.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A free text summary of the investment structure of this deal.

grants.title: Grants
grants.description: Grants made as part of the social investment deal.

equity.title: Equity Investments
equity.description: Equity components of the social investment deal.

credit.title: Credit Investments
credit.description: Loan, bonds and leasing components of the social investment deal.

dateModified.title: Last modified
dateModified.description: The date and time about when any part of the information for this deal was last updated. Should be in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ format.

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: A web link pointing to the source of this data, such as the actual data file or the publisher's website.

Offer.title: Offer
Offer.description: An offer describes the opportunity for investors to join a particular deal by providing finance by purchasing shares, making loans or providing some other form of input described by the offer documents.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this offer.

type.title: Type
type.description: What kind of offer is this. Open offers allow investment at any time. Time limited offers have a closing date, and may only be actioned if they hit their fund-raising targets during the offer period.
enum_descriptions: The offer remains open, with new participants investing at any time.
The offer closes after a specified period.
The offer closes after a specified target is met.
The offer is targeted specifically at existing supporters. It is a way of accessing high-risk capital at a very early stage in a project and to get ‘investment-ready’.

url.title: Web page
url.description: A link to more details of this offer

offerDocumentUrl.title: Offer document URL
offerDocumentUrl.description: A link to the offer document.

startDate.title: Launch date
startDate.description: The launch date of the offer.

endDate.title: Closing date
endDate.description: The closing date of the offer.

extensionDate.title: Extension date
extensionDate.description: If an offer has been extended, the updated closing date should be provided here.

minimumInvestmentTarget.title: Minimum investment target
minimumInvestmentTarget.description: The minimum investment target. In many offers, if this is not reached, the offer will be cancelled.

investmentTarget.title: Optimum investment target
investmentTarget.description: The optimum investment target. This is the primary fundraising goal for the offer. If only one target is given, this should be used.

maximumInvestmentTarget.title: Maximum investment target
maximumInvestmentTarget.description: The maximum investment target. The offer may be closed when it reaches this target, or funds above this amount returned as the project would not be able to use them.

minimumIndividualInvestment.title: Individual investment: minimum
minimumIndividualInvestment.description: The minimum investment amount that an individual investor may provide in response to this offer.

maximumIndividualInvestment.title: Individual investment: maximum
maximumIndividualInvestment.description: The maximum investment amount that an individual investor may provide in response to this offer.

interestRates.title: Interest rate
interestRates.description: The interest rate specified in the offer.

matchFunding.title: Match funding
matchFunding.description: If this offer has a match funding component, this is described here.

status.title: Status
status.description: Is match funding required or secured?

details.title: Details
details.description: Details should be provided here of any match funding conditions for this offer, or any match funding secured.

withdrawals.title: Withdrawal
withdrawals.description: Can investors withdraw their investments? Each condition under which withdrawal can be made should be specified here.

items.title: Condition
items.description: A description of the conditions under which investment withdrawal may take place

start.title: Initial period
start.description: Where there is an initial period during which investment may not be withdrawn this should be given either as the anticipate date (YYYY-MM-DD) at which withdrawal will first be allowed, or as the period from the close of the deal using ISO 8601 duration format. For example, if capital cannot be widthdrawn for 3 years and 6 months, this field should contain '3Y6M'.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of any conditions on withdrawal.

capitalLimit.title: Capital limit
capitalLimit.description: Details of any limit on the amount of capital that can be withdrawn. This field may currently be populated as a string, but a structured representation for this data may be identified in future.

taxReliefs.title: Tax relief
taxReliefs.description: Details of the tax relief available for this offer

csuStandardMark.title: CSU Standard Mark
csuStandardMark.description: The Community Shares Unit standard mark is awarded to offers that meet national standards of good practice in the UK. See https://communityshares.org.uk/standard-mark-0 for more details.

awarded.title: Awarded
awarded.description: Has this offer been awarded the CSU Standard Mark

practitioner.title: Practitioner
practitioner.description: The name of the practitioner involved in this CSU Standard Mark award.

crowdfunding.title: Crowd funding
crowdfunding.description: If this offer took place through a crowdfunding platform, details should be provided here.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: The name of the platform the offer took place on

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the crowdfunding platform page for this offer.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this grant.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the purpose of this grant.

dateOffered.title: Date Offered
dateOffered.description: The date that the grant was offered.

dateAgreed.title: Date Agreed
dateAgreed.description: The date that the grant was agreed.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The ISO 4217 three-digit country code (e.g. GBP for £).

amountRequested.title: Amount requested
amountRequested.description: The total amount requested/applied for from this grant source.

amountCommitted.title: Amount committed
amountCommitted.description: The total committed value of this grant.

amountDisbursed.title: Amount disbursed
amountDisbursed.description: The total committed disbursed from this grant.

fundingOrganization.title: Funding Organization
fundingOrganization.description: Details of the organization making this grant.

isMatchFunding.title: Is match funding?
isMatchFunding.description: If true, this investment, or proportion of it, is counted towards certain match funding requirements of this deal. More details may be given in the notes.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes related to this deal which cannot otherwise be captured as structured data may be entered here. Any information which can be provide using a structured data field MUST NOT be included in the notes, but should instead be represented as structured data.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this equity investment

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this equity investment

type.title: Type
type.description: Does this entry describe a single equity holding by an institutional investor, or one or more equity holdings from retail investors (usually individuals)?

numberOfInvestors.title: Number of investors
numberOfInvestors.description: Where this entry represents the total equity held by more than one party, enter the number of investors the entry describes here. In other cases, enter 1.

dateOffered.title: Date Offered
dateOffered.description: The date that the investment was offered.

dateAgreed.title: Date Agreed
dateAgreed.description: The date that the investment was agreed as part of the deal.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The ISO 4217 three-digit country code (e.g. GBP for £).

value.title: Value
value.description: The total value of the equity provided.

shareClass.title: Share class
shareClass.description: The class of shares provided in return for this investment

shareCapitalIssued.title: Share capital issued
shareCapitalIssued.description: The percentage of the share class issued in return for this investment. Expressed as a value between 0 and 1.

shareRights.title: Share rights
shareRights.description: The rights associated with this class of share.

taxReliefs.title: Tax relief
taxReliefs.description: Details of the tax relief available for this investment.

fundingOrganizations.title: Funding Organization
fundingOrganizations.description: The organization(s) providing this equity investment.

fund.title: Fund
fund.description: The fund that the investment forms a part of.

isMatchFunding.title: Is match funding?
isMatchFunding.description: If true, this investment, or proportion of it, is counted towards certain match funding requirements of this deal. More details may be given in the notes.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes related to this deal which cannot otherwise be captured as structured data may be entered here. Any information which can be provide using a structured data field MUST NOT be included in the notes, but should instead be represented as structured data.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this loan

description.description: A description of this loan/credit funding

dateOffered.title: Date Offered
dateOffered.description: The date that the loan was offered.

dateAgreed.title: Date Agreed
dateAgreed.description: The date that the loan was agreed as part of the Deal.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The ISO 4217 three-digit country code (e.g. GBP for £).

value.title: Value
value.description: The total value of the credit or loan provided.

durationInMonths.title: Term (months)
durationInMonths.description: The term of this credit/loan in months

initialRepaymentHoliday.title: Initial repayment holiday (months)
initialRepaymentHoliday.description: If this loan or credit comes with an initial repayment holiday, enter the period in months here

interestPayable.title: Interest payable
interestPayable.description: The total interest payable over the duration of the credit/loan.

fundingOrganization.title: Funding Organization
fundingOrganization.description: Organization providing this credit or loan.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes related to this deal which cannot otherwise be captured as structured data may be entered here. Any information which can be provide using a structured data field MUST NOT be included in the notes, but should instead be represented as structured data.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: A project funded by a social investment

purposeOfFinance.title: Purpose of finance
purposeOfFinance.description: A description of the role of finance in this project.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: A code describing the classification scheme in use.

code.title: Code
code.description: A code from the classification scheme.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title or label used in the classification scheme.

locations.title: Location
locations.description: Information on locations associated with the project.

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: If this project involves the purchase of assets details of those assets should be provided here.

id.description: A globally unique identifier for this Organization. This enables data on funders and recipients to be linked up across different datasets. [Org-id.guide](http://org-id.guide) links to a number of official registers that can be used to generate identifiers in a common way (e.g. using UK Company or Charity number). Alternatively, unique identifiers from the publisher's internal systems can be used.
id.title: Identifier

companyNumber.description: Registered UK company number, if applicable.
companyNumber.title: Company Number

department.description: The department or sub-unit of this Organization making or receiving the grant.
department.title: Department

contactName.description: The contact person at this Organization.
contactName.title: Contact Name

postalCode.description: Postal code (please try and provide a post code whenever possible)
postalCode.title: Postal Code

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this Organization (e.g. trading name)
alternateName.title: Alternate Name

email.description: The email address for this Organization.
email.title: Email

description.description: A short description of this Organization and its area of work
description.title: Description

organizationType.description: A value from the Organization Type codelist describing the nature of this organization.
organizationType.title: Organization Type

url.description: A web address for the Organization
url.title: Web Address

dateModified.description: The date and time when information about this Organization was last updated.
dateModified.title: Last modified

description.description: A description of this location. This could include details of the element of the activity that takes place here.
description.title: Description

countryCode.description: The ISO Country Code of the location of this activity.
countryCode.title: Country Code

geoCode.description: A code referring to a geographical area, drawn from an established gazetteer. For example, the code for a local authority ward, or parliamentary constituency.
geoCode.title: Geographic Code

geoCodeType.description: The type of Geographic Code (geoCode) used (e.g. Ward, Parliamentary Constituency etc.). This value for this field should be drawn from the [codelist of geographic code types](https://github.com/ThreeSixtyGiving/standard/tree/master/codelists/geoCodeType.csv).
geoCodeType.title: Geographic Code Type

latitude.description: The latitude of a point location
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude of a point location
longitude.title: Longitude

Fund.title: Fund
Fund.description: Investments and grants are often made from specific funding schemes. This provides space to detail the particular funding scheme with which finance is associated.

url.description: A web link to more details of this fund.
url.title: URL

dateModified.description: The date and time when information about this fund was last updated.
dateModified.title: Last modified

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: An asset purchased as part of a project in receipt of investment.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this asset

description.title: Description
description.description: A short title or description of this asset

status.title: Status
status.description: Is the purchase of these assets planned or completed?

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: What is the estimated or actual quantity of these assets to be purchased.

totalValue.title: Total value
totalValue.description: What is the total value of this/these asset(s)?

isSecurity.title: Is this asset security?
isSecurity.description: Set to true if this asset is being used as security for some other component of a related deal.

referenceNumbers.title: Reference number(s)
referenceNumbers.description: One or more reference numbers for this asset. For example, the land registry title number in the case of property assets.

base.title: Base
base.description: If this interest rate is based on a formula with a base rate + a percentage (e.g. Bank of England rate + 35) then a codelist entry to describe the base rate is given here. Where no recognised codelist value exists, a short clear string should be used that can be easily interpreted by a data user to identify the base rate uses. Where this is no base rate, and the margin specifies the full exchange rate, base should be left blank.

margin.title: Margin
margin.description: The rate of interest charged above the base rate, as a value between 0 and 1 (e.g. 1% - 0.01).

effectiveRate.title: Effective rate
effectiveRate.description: In cases where a variable base and margin are used, or where the interest payments have a complex profile (e.g. changing rates over the period of the investment; or effects of compound interest) then the effective rate should provide a figure that represents either (a) the value of the base and margin at the time of the offer; or (b) the average effective rate for the anticipated duration of an investment (Note: this is not the same as a Mortgage Effective Interest Rate).

isConditional.title: Is conditional?
isConditional.description: If true, the payment of interest may be subject to certain conditions. The conditions may be described in the details.

isVariable.title: Is variable?
isVariable.description: If true, the rate of interest paid may vary based on time or performance of the related offer, deal or project. The rate recorded should be the initial anticipated rate. Any basis for variations may be explained in details.

details.title: Details
details.description: A description of the interest rate, and any specific conditions that apply, such as interest payment delays (e.g. interest is only paid from year 3 onwards), or other conditions on interest payments.

TaxRelief.title: Tax relief
TaxRelief.description: A tax relief that may be applied to an offer or investment.

type.title: Type
type.description: A code describing the type of tax relief available

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of this tax relief

InvestmentPurpose.title: Purpose
InvestmentPurpose.description: The purpose(s) of this investment into the related organisation or project.
